abstract: Given the slump in travel, you would think there would be no room for another hotel rating business. But no.
snippet: Given the slump in travel, you would think there would be no room for another hotel rating business. But no.
lead_paragraph: THANKS to the Internet and its spawns like Facebook and Twitter, everybody’s a critic. But not everybody is a good critic.

headline.main: Aspiring to Rate Rooms When Everyone’s a Critic
headline.print_headline: Aspiring to Rate Rooms When Everyone’s a Critic
